item.title: Setting Up This Site
item.description: To kick things off, I want to share some details about how I created this site in case theyâ€™re helpful for anyone else in the future. I landed on the GitHub/Hugo workflow after some Google searching and went with it for a few reasons: I already had a GitHub account and wanted to get more practice using git, and take advantage of the free hosting options there. Amber Thomas provides a walkthrough of setting up a Hugo site using blogdown, and she made it look pretty simple.
